message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. Could you meet me halfway at $125?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to stick to my budget. Could we perhaps agree on $110?
